About Me

BIO

Korean national with international background who thoroughly enjoys teaching himself new things. Hobbies include working out, playing video games with friends, playing and listening to music, and exploring new people and environments.

Education

HKUST BSc in Physics

Pursuing a BSc in Physics at HKUST. Admitted under the University Admission Scholarship Scheme for IB Diploma Holders

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

British International School Jakarta (British School Jakarta)

International Baccalaureate Diploma. Overall 41/45 Points (Top 3.3%): Including Higher Level Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics, Standard Level Mandarin, English- Language & Literature, and Economics. An Extended Essay in Physics

Experience

Translator/Interpreter, 35th ADA BDE USFK, Osan Air Base, Korea

Translated and interpreted spoken/documented Military English<-> Korean under intense pressure for high ranking officials. Helped US soldiers from Hawaii adjust to Korea during exercise periods.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Leader and Bassist, HKUST KSA Band, Hong Kong

As a leader, took initiative to promote and plan performances infront of hundreds of cross-university audience.

Relevant Skills

Self-taught Programmer

Python Numpy/Scipy Matplotlib Pandas (Advanced), C++ (Advanced), JavaScript HTML CSS (Advanced), Vue.js (Intermediate), Django (Intermediate), PostgreSQL (Basic), Git (Basic)
